title: Add glow effect to dot
message_prompt: When dots are selected, I want them to light-up like a sun.
message_edit:
I will update the Dot.js file to make the dots "light-up" when selected by changing their material properties to give them an emissive glow effect.

Steps:
1. Modify the `meshStandardMaterial` in Dot.js to include an emissive property that will make the dots glow when selected.
